articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Banjul
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Arrives in Banjul
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday arrived in Banjul to pay an official goodwill visit to the Republic of Gambia.
					 Accompanying him were Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Myong San and other suite members.
					
					Kim Yong Nam and his party were greeted at the airport by Vice-President of Gambia Aja Isatou Njie Saidy, Minister of Energy Sirra Wally Ndou Njaie, Minister of Finance and Economic Affairs Abdou Kolley, Minister of Fishery, Water Resources and Parliamentary Affairs Lamin Kaba Bajo and other government ministers, military commanders and officials concerned of Gambia, DPRK Ambassador to Gambia Ri Kyong Son and diplomatic envoys of different countries in Banjul.
					
					 A welcome ceremony for Kim Yong Nam took place at the airport.
					
					  Many citizens and artistes warmly welcomed Kim Yong Nam and his party.
					
					 Kim made public an arrival statement.

articles.title: Reception Given for Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Reception Given for Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A reception was given in honor of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on an official goodwill visit to Gambia, on Thursday.
					 Present there on invitation together with Kim Yong Nam were Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Ri Kyong Son, DPRK ambassador to Gambia, and other suite members.
					
					 On hand were Vice-President of Gambia Aja Isatou Njie Saidy, Speaker of the National Assembly Elizabeth Lenne and government ministers, military commanders and officials concerned of Gambia, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations in Banjul.
					
					 Aja Isatou Njie Saidy said in her speech at the reception that the DPRK has made big achievements despite foreign forces' ceaseless interference and the Korean people having strong will and courage are exercising influence in the international arena.
					
					 She referred to the fact that the relations between the two countries have developed on good terms because of their common desire, expressing belief that the relations of bilateral cooperation would grow stronger through the implementation of the projects for socio-economic development.
					
					   Kim Yong Nam said in his speech that the Gambian government and people have consolidated the national independence by eradicating the aftermath of the colonial rule and made successes in the work for economic development and the prosperity of the country.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has paid a deep attention to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations with Gambia, he said, expressing belief that this visit would mark an important occasion in injecting fresh energy into the development of the relations of bilateral cooperation.
					
					  There was a performance given by Gambian artistes.

articles.title: 30th Anniversary of Public Health Law Marked
articles.content:
30th Anniversary of Public Health Law Marked
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Friday to mark the 30th anniversary of the promulgation of the Public Health Law thanks to President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The participants heard the recorded historic speech "Let Us Implement the Public Health Law to the Letter" made by the President at the Fourth Session of the Sixth  Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on April 4, Juche 69 (1980).
					
					 Vice-Premier of the DPRK Cabinet O Su Yong said in his report that Kim Il Sung made sure that the above-said public health law was adopted at the Fourth Session of the Sixth SPA and made public a work indicating tasks and ways for implementing it, adding that this was an event of great historical significance in carrying out the Juche-oriented cause of public health. 
					
					 The Public Health Law which comprehensively deals with popular health policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state is a Juche-oriented public health charter which provides a legal guarantee for all principles and requirements for freeing the working people from all diseases once and for all and promoting their health, he noted.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has energetically led the drive for defending the Juche-oriented idea and theory of public health and bringing about a new turn in the health service.
					
					 The reporter recalled that Kim Jong Il provided a national meeting of public health workers and sent the historic letter "On the Further Improvement of the Health Service" to its participants in April, Juche 74 (1985), clearly indicating tasks and ways for further developing the health service, and saw to it that various new laws were instituted to provide a legal guarantee for the health service. 
					
					 The reporter stressed that under the wise leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il great successes have been made in the public health service and the advantages and vitality of the law have been fully demonstrated over the last three decades. 
					
					 Pointing out that the true nature of socialism lies in prioritizing the people's wellbeing and regarding it as absolute, the reporter called on the public health workers to thoroughly implement the above-said law so that the benefits of the Party and the state may perfectly reach the working people. 
					
					 It was attended by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and exemplary public health workers.

articles.title: New School Year Begin at Branch Schools
articles.content:
New School Year Begin at Branch Schools
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The first classes of the new school year have begun in over one thousand branch schools in different parts of the country on Thursday on the occasion of the new school year Juche 99 (2010) in the DPRK.
					 Newcomers were warmly welcomed by leading officials of local party and power organs and their parents. 
					
					 Among the branch schools are more than 500 schools, each with less than 20 pupils.
					
					 There is a dense network of well-regulated educational institutions in the DPRK ranging from towns to remote mountainous villages and islets. All the school-age children are given an ample opportunity of learning thanks to the universal eleven-year free compulsory education.

articles.title: New Science Films Produced
articles.content:
New Science Films Produced
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio has produced new films to give a scientific and technical knowledge to people.  
					 The film "3G Mobile Network" reflects the rapid development of communications.  
					
					 It shows the stages of developing communications through the first, second and third generations and explains the performance of the 3G mobile network in an explicit way.   
					
					 The film "Integrated Wood Processing Technology" is conducive to improving the quality of wood furniture and fixtures.
					
					 It gives a theoretical explanation about the general concept of integrated wood and its prevention of wooden ware from being changed in shape. 
					
					 It also introduces the production processes of the Hamhung Wood Processing Factory put on the basis of the CNC technology and dwelling houses in Mansudae Street furnished with the factory's integrated wood products.

articles.title: New Kind of Welding Rod
articles.content:
New Kind of Welding Rod
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-materials Industry has of late made a new kind of cast-iron welding rod.
					 It is superior to nickel rod in deposition, welding strength and joining between weld-molten iron and cast-iron weldment.
					
					 It can give cold-deposition to any large cast-iron weldment without preheating irrespective of seasons and makes it possible to process shut with machine.
					
					 Its coating material is abundant in the country and its core wire is made of ordinary steel. So it can be mass-produced without using nickel.
					
					 The newly developed welding rod is available for all sorts of cast-iron weldments.

articles.title: Two-year Old Preschooler
articles.content:
Two-year Old Preschooler
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Another infant genius has come in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, attracting public attention. It is Kim Yu Jong, a two-year-old girl studying at Hasin Kindergarten in Sosong District, Pyongyang.
					 Her grandfather Kim Sang Yon, 64, told KCNA that she began to learn Korean characters one year or more after birth.
					
					 Finding her natural gift, teachers of the kindergarten and her parents have taught her Korean language with letter cards and words from TV and magazines.
					
					 Now she has mastered Korean alphabet, including difficult letters, and can read newspapers.
					
					 She also has a fine feeling for music.
					
					 When she was a little baby, she used to stop crying with the sound of song, and when she began speaking, she could memorize and sing any songs she listened to once, even those difficult for adults to sing.
					
					 She is cultivating her talent to the full under the country's advantageous socialist education system, amid great expectation of people.

articles.title: Strong Action against "Cooperation" with Outsides Urged
articles.content:
Strong Action against "Cooperation" with Outsides Urged
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are desperately pursuing "cooperation" in nuclear issue, "cooperation" in war moves and "cooperation over human rights issue" while persistently denying national cooperation and pushing the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe in "cooperation" with outside forces. These treacherous and anti-reunification acts will only result in bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse, escalating the tension and creating the danger of a new war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 The conservative ruling group's criminal acts of frantically pursuing "cooperation" with outside forces against fellow countrymen, dead-set against national cooperation, are a blatant challenge to the Koreans aspiring after the national unity, the  peace of the country and national reunification, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 There is no future for those who are keen on the political and military confrontation with fellow countrymen, acting servants of the foreign aggressors, their backs turned on the country and the nation.
					
					 The DPRK, prompted by its heavy responsibility for the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation, can never remain an onlooker to the frantic moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet bellicose forces for confrontation and war with it but is taking strong measures for self-defence to resolutely frustrate those moves.
					
					 It is as foolish an act as trying to sweep the sea with a broom for the conservative group to seek to do harm to the DPRK through "cooperation" with outside forces.
					
					 Neither collusion nor nexus between the aggressors and traitors can ever frighten the DPRK.
					
					 This, on the contrary, will reinforce its revolutionary will to meet the challenge of the enemy at a single stroke with the might of Songun. The DPRK will make the enemy's any provocation, "cooperation" in the war moves and nuclear "cooperation" futile. 
					
					 The above-said traitors are bound to meet a severe judgment of history as they seek a way out in doing harm to compatriots in "cooperation" with outside forces, opposed to national cooperation.

articles.title: Scientists and Technicians Urged to Leap Higher and Faster
articles.content:
Scientists and Technicians Urged to Leap Higher and Faster
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls on all the people to bring about a decisive turn in the development of the nation's science and technology and accelerate the final victory in building a thriving nation under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The recent national meeting of scientists and technicians in the Songun era clearly manifested the unshakable will of the WPK to bring about a great change in the revolution and construction with a firm hold on the science and technology as well as the most revolutionary ideology and arms and turn the country into an invincible power and a genuine paradise for the people where everything thrives, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK are pace-setters who paved the way for the future with strenuous researches and painstaking efforts despite harsh trials and difficulties, cherishing the faith that science knows no border but they have the socialist country of Juche.
					
					 An epochal turn has been made in the development of the nation's science and technology and such eye-opening events as the completion of the Juche iron production system and the modernization of vinalon factory have been taking place one after another across the country to carry into practice the behests of President Kim Il Sung. This present stirring reality would have been unthinkable without the devoted efforts of scientists and technicians.
					
					The ongoing drive for building an economic power represents a historic advance propelled by dint of science and technology. All the party members and other working people as well as scientists and technicians should steadily create events glorifying the Songun era by means of intelligence and technology. Herein lies the way for winning a great victory in the drive for great surge and bringing General Secretary Kim Jong Il's plan for building of a thriving nation into a brilliant reality.
					
					 Let us leap higher and faster, exploring latest technologies as required by the era of knowledge-based economy. This is a militant banner that should be upheld by us.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the scientists, technicians and other people to intensify the scientific and technological revolution and thus put into practice the WPK's idea of pushing back the frontier of latest science and achieve a great victory in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Adherence to Independent Stand Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Independent Stand Called for
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- It is a national and international duty of the progressive people and a task they have assumed before the times to shatter the evermore undisguised moves of the imperialists and dominationist forces against independence and history and struggle for the building of an independent new society, a new world. What is important here is to adhere to the independent stand. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Important in adhering to the independent stand is to guarantee the independence in politics and economy.
					
					 Only when any country and nation maintain political independence can the already achieved national independence and sovereignty be defended and the sound development and prosperity of the country be achieved.
					
					 A regime which pursues politics under the pressure of others or according to their instructions without the independent stand is bound not to stand on their own feet, yielding to high-handed and arbitrary practices of foreign forces, and make a mess of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Adhering to the principle of independence provides a guarantee for the independent development of the country and the nation and the development of international relations based on independence.
					
					 Self-supporting in economy helps strengthen the material foundation of the country, push forward social and economic development and defend independence.
					
					 Only self-reliance is the way of living independently and it guarantees the economic progress of the country and national prosperity.
					
					 Self-reliant national defence capability provides a military guarantee of independent and sovereignty state and serves as a reliable treasured sword for defending the sovereignty.
					
					 It is evidenced by the shining history of the struggle of the Korean people who have won victory only in struggle to defend socialism and in confrontation with the U.S., tightly holding the arms of the revolution on the basis of the great Songun revolutionary idea and line.

articles.title: Japanese Rightwing Threat to Koreans Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Rightwing Threat to Koreans Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers' Corps of south Korea issued a statement on March 29 in denunciation of Japanese rightwing gangsters' threat to Koreans.
					 The statement accused Japanese rightwing gangsters of sending notices together with daggers to the governor of Hyogo Prefecture and Kobe Korean High School threatening to kill Koreans and set fire to the school. This is a retaliation against the governor of the prefecture who expressed the view that Korean schools should be included in the tuition-free program for senior high schools, it said, and went on:
					
					 What matters is that those human rights abuses of the gangsters are not subject to any sanctions and punishment as is the case with the rightwing politicians of Japan insisting on discrimination against the Koreans. 
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese government not to remain an onlooker to the recent criminal act of the rightwing gangsters.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Figure
						
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, released a statement on Mar. 25 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement stressed that President Kim Il Sung is the great sun of mankind as he performed undying feats for the development of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK and the cause of global independence.
					
					 It also said that Kim Jong Il is the prominent leader who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power nobody dares provoke by wisely leading the Korean people.
					
					 It expressed belief that under his wise leadership the Korean people would achieve great success in the efforts to fling open the door to a thriving nation in 2012.

articles.title: Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works Off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works Off Press in Mexico
						
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- "Three Charters for National Reunification", a collection of President Kim Il Sung's works, was published by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism on Mar. 25 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The preface of the collection says that President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, is the lodestar of Korea's reunification as he devoted his whole life to its independent reunification.

articles.title: Magazine "Korean Information" Issued in Sweden
articles.content:
Magazine "Korean Information" Issued in Sweden
						
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association published a special issue of its magazine "Korean Information" on Mar. 26 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The magazine carried an editorial with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The Day of the Sun is set for the Korean people to honor the memory of the great leader of the nation who liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and built an independent state, the first of its kind in Korea, by relying on the efforts of the people.
					
					 Today the Korean people are working hard to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, guided by the Juche idea fathered by him.
					
					 One of the President's great feats is that he founded the KPA.
					
					 April 9, 1993, is the significant day when Kim Jong Il was elected as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could reliably defend its dignity and sovereignty, victoriously conclude the "Arduous March", the forced march, and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The magazine also carried an article introducing the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK.

articles.title: Acto central por 30 aniversario de ley de salud publica
articles.content:
Acto central por 30 aniversario de ley de salud publica 
  Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 2 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto central por el 30o aniversario de la publicacion de la ley de salud publica elaborada por el Presidente            Kim Il Sung.
					 Los participantes escucharon la grabacion del discurso del Presidente pronunciado el 4 de abril del 69(1980) de la Era Juche en el IV periodo de Sesiones de la VI Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "Apliquemos consecuentemente la ley de salud publica".
					
					 El viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, en su informe, se refirio a que el Presidente hizo que se adoptara la ley de salud publica de la RPDC en el IV periodo de Sesiones de la VI Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y publico la obra que aclara las tareas y medios para realizarlos y prosiguio que esto fue un evento de gran significacion historica en el cumplimiento de la causa  de la construccion de salud publica del Juche.
					
					 Dijo que la ley de salud publica, que sintetiza las politicas de salud publica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado, es la carta autoctona de esta rama que garantiza con ley todos los principios y demandas presentados en liberar por completo a las masas populares trabajadoras de las enfermedades de toda clase y en fomentar la salud de ellas.
					
					Menciono que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio con dinamismo la lucha por defender la idea y teoria de salud publica del Juche y producir nuevo cambio en esta labor. 
					
					 Subrayo que el Dirigente hizo convocar en abril del 74 (1985) de la Era Juche la Conferencia Nacional de los trabajadores de salud publica y envio a los asistentes a la conferencia la carta historica "Para un mayor mejoramiento e intensificacion de la labor de salud publica", que indico las tareas y medios que se presentan para desarrollar aun mas esta labor. E hizo establecer nuevamente varias leyes para dar la garantia legal a la labor de salud publica.
					
					 Senalo que gracias a la sabia direccion del Presidente y el Dirigente se lograron los grandes exitos en esta rama durante los 30 anos pasados y se manifestaron con vigor la superioridad y vitalidad de la ley en cuestion.
					
					 La peculiaridad propia del socialismo consiste en anteponer el bienestar del pueblo y absolutizarlo y prestar todos los beneficios a este, dijo y destaco que los trabajadores de salud publica deben cumplir cabalmente dicha ley y hacer que los beneficios del partido y el Estado se dirijan mas bien a los trabajadores.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok, funcionarios y trabajadores destacados de salud publica.

articles.title: Cooperacion con fuerzas extranjeras es crimen antinacional y anti-paz
articles.content:
Cooperacion con fuerzas extranjeras es crimen antinacional y anti-paz 
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos se aferran a las crueles campanas de la "cooperacion" con las fuerzas extranjeras en el asunto nuclear, en la guerra y en el problema de DDHH, llevando a la ruptura las relaciones Norte-Sur, en vez de cooperar con los connacionales. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual de este viernes, lo califica de un crimen antinacional y anti-reunificacion que traera la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la agravacion de la tension y el peligro de una nueva guerra, y continua:
					
					El crimen de gobernantes conservadores, que recurren con frenesi a la "cooperacion" con las fuerzas extranjeras, deviene un desafio cruel a la nacion coreana que desea la unidad nacional, la paz del pais y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					No tienen el futuro los que se entregan a la confrontacion politica y militar con los connacionales sirviendose de lacayos a los invasores extranjeros sin hacer caso del destino del pais y la nacion.
					
					Partiendo de la importante responsabilidad sobre la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la nacion, no podemos observar con brazos cruzados las freneticas maniobras belicas anti-RPDC de los imperialistas estadounidenses y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, sino tomamos las fuertes medidas autodefensitas para frustrarlas rotundamente.
					
					La banda de conservadores intenta atentar a la RPDC mediante la "cooperacion" con las fuerzas extranjeras, pero, tal conducta es una vana ilusion.
					
					La confabulacion entre el agresor y el traidor nunca puede sorprender a la RPDC, sino duplica la voluntad revolucionaria de rechazar de un solo golpe con el poderio del Songun los desafios de los enemigos.
					
					Estamos listos para frustrar cualesquier provocaciones y "cooperaciones" belicas y nucleares de los enemigos.
					
					Los traidores, que niegan la cooperacion nacional y buscan su salida en danar a los connacionales mediante la "cooperacion" con las fuerzas foraneas, seran condenados severamente por la historia.

articles.title: Dada primera leccion de nuevo ano escolar en escuelas anexas de Corea
articles.content:
Dada primera leccion de nuevo ano escolar en escuelas anexas de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- El dia primero cuando todas las escuelas de Corea acogen el nuevo curso escolar para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, tambien mas de mil y cientos de escuelas anexas levantadas en todas partes del pais dieron a la vez la primera clase.
					Ese dia, los funcionarios de los organos locales del partido y el Poder felicitaron a los alumnos junto con sus padres en las escuelas anexas.
					
					Entre estas hay mas de 500, que tienen menos de 20 alumnos.
					
					Corea tiene la ordenada red de educacion tanto en las ciudades como en las aldeas montanosas e insulares. Todos los ninos de edad escolar estudian a sus anchas disfrutando del beneficio de la ensenanza obligatoria general gratuita de 11 anos.

articles.title: Nuevas peliculas cientificas
articles.content:
Nuevas peliculas cientificas 
Pyongyang, 2 de abril (ATCC) -- Los Estudios de Filmes Documentales y Cientificos de Corea acabaron de filmar nuevas peliculas cientificas que dan al pueblo los conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos.
					La pelicula "Comunicaciones moviles de tercera generacion" refleja el estado actual de las comunicaciones en desarrollo vertiginoso. 
					
					El filme muestra con los cuadros sencillos el curso de modernizacion de las comunicaciones desde la primera generacion hacia la segunda y la tercera y los principios de operacion de las comunicaciones moviles de 3G.
					
					La otra cinta "Tecnologia de elaboracion de maderas integradas" da ayuda a elevar la calidad de los muebles de madera o de los materiales de acabado para la construccion. 
					
					El filme da la concepcion general sobre los materiales integrados y explica como estos materiales impiden la deformacion de los productos de madera. 
					
					Ademas, muestra los procesos productivos de la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Madera de Hamhung en que se aplico la tecnologia CNC, y las viviendas de la avenida Mansudae reconstruida con las maderas integradas producidas en esta fabrica.
